description: Moonlight brightens the white striations of the traesharm hedges, as well as the cream-hued magnolia blossoms in an earthy parody of the starry sky.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk of the lone tree, where the occasional wilted brown-edged petal sits.

Pale green fruits hug the green and white foliage of the traesharm hedges, some hidden by fallen magnolia leaves that are a glossy, dark green on one side and pale brown on the other.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk of the lone, blossoming tree, where the occasional wilted brown-edged petal sits.

Clusters of ripe violet fruits draw both birds and bees to the traesharm hedges, and the treasures missed on the bush litter the ground.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk of the lone magnolia tree completely devoid of its large white blossoms.

Thick green and white-leaved traesharm hedges provide a secluded bower, surrounding a lone magnolia.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk of the tree and is littered with curling leaves.

Snow-capped traesharm hedges surround an ice-frosted magnolia, occasionally spinning off wisps of flakes as strong gusts dislodges them.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk of the tree and has been meticulously cleaned to keep seating available.  A crackling copper firepit has been stacked with fragrant cherry wood and provides a cozy atmosphere for those enjoying the evening.

Surrounded by a tall traesharm hedge, the garden niche is sheltered by an umbrella-shaped magnolia tree filled with giant cream-hued blossoms larger than a giantman's hand.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk, providing sheltering shadows from the moonlight and a cozy setting for lovers or those seeking quiet contemplation.

Snow-capped traesharm hedges surround an ice-frosted magnolia, occasionally spinning off wisps of flakes as strong gusts dislodges them.  A smooth marble bench curves around the huge trunk of the tree and has been meticulously cleaned to keep seating available.
title: [Bard Guild, Garden Niche]
